summary: Avengers: Endgame, alcuni dettagli dalla nuova immagine promozionale
title: Avengers: Endgame, alcuni dettagli dalla nuova immagine promozionale
body:
Avengers: Endgame, alcuni dettagli dalla nuova immagine promozionale

Da quando è uscito Avengers: Infinity War e metà dell’universo è stato decimato da Thanos, inclusi alcuni dei nostri amati supereroi, i fan hanno speculato sui possibili viaggi nel tempo da parte dei restanti supereroi come Iron Man, Capitan America, Black Widow, Hulk, Hawkeye e Thor, tra gli altri.

Infatti, subito dopo l’uscita di Avengers: Infinity War, alcune foto provenienti dal set di Avenge…

View On WordPress

summary: Drabbles: The Queen of Genovia (1/?)
title: Drabbles: The Queen of Genovia (1/?)
body:
Fandoms: The Princess Diaries, The Avengers.
Summary: Her lessons didn’t teach her to handle alien invasions or superheroes.
(Based on Stan Lee’s cameo in The Princess Diaries 2 and in a meme, no beta)

Chapter two and three in AO3!

When Mia Thermopolis, a simple student of San Francisco, discovers that she is a princess, heir to the throne, and later is crowned as Queen of Genovia, she believes that nothing can surprise her anymore.

As the math class showed her, Mia is excellent at making mistakes.

This is corroborated when the sky opens and aliens descend from it.
Joe appears in her office two days later, while she signs forms and permits to help the North American country, with an extensive file titled SHIELD.

reblog.comment:

blog.description: AmeriCanadian. #IPlayBioware. #BPD. Shameless Loki apologist. Still feeling the Bern. Ask me for my Discord.

summary: What would you like to see from Loki in the movies?
question: What would you like to see from Loki in the movies?
answer:
MORE MAGIC MORE MAGIC MORE MAGIC

  • And you know, maybe some actual reconciliation with Thor, instead of that nauseating bullshit Taika Waititi shoved down our collective throats.
  • I’d like to see him confront his jötun heritage. Maybe even claim his rightful throne? 👑 More jötun!Loki? More frost giants? A Jötunheim that’s finally allowed to recover from Asgard’s colonialism and prosper again? Yes, please.
  • I’d also love to have more details of what happened to him after he fell from the Bifröst, how he got involved with Thanos, etc.
  • And just… fucking… let him be happy and independent for once in his millennia-long existence?! HE DESERVES IT 💚

reblog.comment:

  • I’d like to see him confront his jötun heritage. Maybe even claim his rightful throne? 👑 More jötun!Loki? More frost giants? A Jötunheim that’s finally allowed to recover from Asgard’s colonialism and prosper again? Yes, please.
  • I’d also love to have more details of what happened to him after he fell from the Bifröst, how he got involved with Thanos, etc.
  • And just… fucking… let him be happy and independent for once in his millennia-long existence?! HE DESERVES IT 💚

trail.content_raw:

  • And you know, maybe some actual reconciliation with Thor, instead of that nauseating bullshit Taika Waititi shoved down our collective throats.
  • I’d like to see him confront his jötun heritage. Maybe even claim his rightful throne? 👑 More jötun!Loki? More frost giants? A Jötunheim that’s finally allowed to recover from Asgard’s colonialism and prosper again? Yes, please.
  • I’d also love to have more details of what happened to him after he fell from the Bifröst, how he got involved with Thanos, etc.
  • And just… fucking… let him be happy and independent for once in his millennia-long existence?! HE DESERVES IT 💚
trail.content:

  • And you know, maybe some actual reconciliation with Thor, instead of that nauseating bullshit Taika Waititi shoved down our collective throats.
  • I’d like to see him confront his jötun heritage. Maybe even claim his rightful throne? 👑 More jötun!Loki? More frost giants? A Jötunheim that’s finally allowed to recover from Asgard’s colonialism and prosper again? Yes, please.
  • I’d also love to have more details of what happened to him after he fell from the Bifröst, how he got involved with Thanos, etc.
  • And just… fucking… let him be happy and independent for once in his millennia-long existence?! HE DESERVES IT 💚
